text: Need Lily Walker for Priceline campaign. Budget around $2,879, looking for 2 x 90-second product demo, 1 x 15-second TikTok, 1 x Facebook post, 1 x Lifestyle photography, 2 x Radio interview. 4 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 5 months.
